property.name: name
property.hint: Sets the name of the object.

property.name: value
property.hint: Sets the default or selected value of the control.

property.name: tabindex
property.hint: Sets the index that defines the tab order for the object.

property.name: title
property.hint: Sets advisory information (a ToolTip) for the object.

property.name: accesskey
property.hint: Sets the accelerator key for the object.

property.name: extAttr
property.hint: Sets custom attributes for the object.For example:extAttr='key=value,key1=value'

property.name: indexed
property.hint: Sets whether the object generates index; true: generate, false(default): not generate.

property.name: disabled
property.hint: Sets the status of the object.false:Default. Element is not disabled.true:Element is disabled.

property.name: modelField
property.hint: Binding a field of ViewModel.

property.name: readonly
property.hint: Sets whether the content of the object is read-only

property.name: inContext
property.hint: Sets whether to automatically add context path for URL

property.name: size
property.hint: Sets size for the object's content.

property.name: alt
property.hint: Sets a text alternative to the graphic.

property.name: checkedValue
property.hint: Sets a value that when it is equal to the value of the control,the control will be checked.

property.name: locale
property.hint: Sets locale of object.

property.name: outputFileName
property.hint: Sets the name of download file.

property.name: checked
property.hint: Sets the state of the check box or radio button.

property.name: maxlength
property.hint: Sets the maximum number of characters that the user can enter in a text control.

property.name: labelField
property.hint: Sets the xpath for option's label

property.name: target
property.hint: Defines a frame or window that a URL is displayed in.

property.name: filter
property.hint: Sets whether to convert the HTML tag.

property.name: href
property.hint: Sets the URL of the linked style sheet

property.name: src
property.hint: Sets the URL for object

property.name: valueField
property.hint: Sets the xpath for option's value

property.name: contentType
property.hint: Sets the mine type for download file

property.name: validateAttr
property.hint: For data validation,Example: validateAttr='allowNull=true;maxLen=6'

property.name: styleClass
property.hint: Sets the class of the object.

property.name: style
property.hint: Sets an inline style for the element.

property.name: onmouseover
property.hint: Fires when the user moves the mouse pointer into the object.

property.name: onmouseout
property.hint: Fires when the user moves the mouse pointer outside the boundaries of the object.

property.name: onmouseup
property.hint: Fires when the user releases a key.

property.name: onmousemove
property.hint: Fires when the user moves the mouse over the object.

property.name: ondblclick
property.hint: Fires when the user double-clicks the object.

property.name: onclick
property.hint: Fires when the user clicks the object.

property.name: onmousedown
property.hint: Fires when the user clicks the object with either mouse button.

property.name: onchange
property.hint: Fires when the contents of the object or selection have changed.

property.name: onkeyup
property.hint: Fires when the user releases a key.

property.name: onkeypress
property.hint: Fires when the user presses an alphanumeric key.

property.name: onblur
property.hint: Fires when the object loses the input focus.

property.name: onkeydown
property.hint: Fires when the user presses a key.

property.name: onfocus
property.hint: Fires when the object receives focus.

property.name: onselect
property.hint: Fires when the current selection changes.
